Visualize: Table 1 & 2; Description: "We formalize this need as a new task: inducing a lexicon that is predictive of a set of target variables yet uncorrelated to a set of confounding variables." "The ten highest-scoring words in lexicons generated by Deep Residualization + BOW (DR+BOW), Mutual Information (MI), Residialized Regression (RR), and regression (R)."
